headline: Democratic insiders warn the party will get 'absolutely destroyed' in the midterms without a strong economic message as infighting and January 6 overshadow Biden's wins
author: Kayla Epstein
sentences: After Sen. Kyrsten Sinema, an Arizona Democrat, refused to vote to alter the filibuster and allow Democratic voting-rights legislation through the Senate, Democrats in her home state were preoccupied not with reelecting their candidate who's up for reelection in November, Sen.
